categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems star systems

nodes.text: The Listehol system was a star system located in the Kwymar sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Located at the intersection of the Hydian Way and the Listehol Run, the Listehol system was a notable spice-smuggling system.

During the Galactic Civil War, the space station Port Tooga owned by Shoola the Hutt was a major transshipment point for spices and all kinds of illicit goods along the Hydian Way. The station was located close to the star of the system, where solar winds, stellar ejections, and radiation overwhelmed Imperial sensors. Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, the Rebel frigate Shadow Raptor visited the station in order to take possession of a group of droids, which were actually programmed by the Empire. This eventually led to a droid revolt on the Shadow Raptor.
